attributes.action: Stop bin men blocking the road or make them do their job overnight
attributes.additional_details: Because while I’m trying to get to school on time for exams or a normal school day it holds me up and makes me late
attributes.background: Make a law so bin men can’t stop in the middle of the road or change their hours to overnight

rejection.details:
The Government are not responsible for local bin men and other refuse collectors. If you would like to see changes to the way your bins are collected you can get in touch with your local council.

If you would like to start a new petition on another topic in the future please make sure to use your full name, as we cannot accept petitions with first names only.
